description:
It`s time for the Midicians all-girl water sports meet. Will Retoree be able to work together with Rosia for the most important event?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ba-dump!? It`s a Floaty Water Sports Meet Full of Girls! Po-- (etc.)
